name: cordova-plugin-change-app-info
description: Cordova plugin to change app info with iOS optimization, gradient splash screens, and JSON config storage
author: vnkhoado

_comment.sharp: Fast image processing for icons and gradient splash generation (RECOMMENDED)
_comment.jimp: Fallback image processor (pure JS) for icons and gradients
_comment.config-storage: Uses JSON files instead of sqlite - works on all cloud builds
_comment.auto-install: Dependencies auto-install via 'npm install' - runs at before_prepare hook
_comment.gradient-support: CSS gradient support for native splash screens on Android and iOS
_comment.usage: Add SPLASH_GRADIENT preference to config.xml with linear-gradient CSS value
_comment.note: No need to manually install - auto-install-deps.js handles everything during build
_comment.removed-in-2.9.11: Removed sqlite3 and better-sqlite3 - using JSON config storage instead (works everywhere)
